fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Boomerang: Throw it at someone during the night, it will miss, it comes back to you halfway through the day, killing the person you threw it at during the night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Gday!: Wake up before everyone else
-Gnight!: Go to sleep before everyone else, you cannot be lynched while you are asleep but you lose access to the channel

fields.name: - Kangaroo:
fields.value: An NPC spawns every 3 days, only the Australian's Boomerang can kill it, it votes completely randomly, if there are kangaroos equal to the amount of players left, the kangaroos win and everyone dies

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: live the see the end of the game
